instance_template: loc("A"). loc("B"). loc("C"). loc("D"). loc("E"). edge("A", "B"). edge("A", "D"). edge("B", "C"). edge("D", "E"). time(0..6). deliver_to("C"). deliver_to("E").

hard_constraints.description: We must ensure that the warehouse robot starts its journey specifically at station A at the beginning of the timeline (time zero).
To maintain physical consistency, the robot is only permitted to move between stations that are connected by a defined edge in the facility map.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at(L1, T), at(L2, T+1), not edge(L1, L2), not edge(L2, L1), time(T), time(T+1).

hard_constraints.description: The robot must fulfill its mission requirements by visiting each designated delivery station exactly once during its scheduled route.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- deliver_to(L), N = #count { T : at(L, T) }, N != 1.
